title: Prepaid cards not working (stuck at redeeming loading screen)
body: I received a prepaid card for Christmas and when I try to redeem it it doesn't load the loading wheel just keeps spinning.

replies.body: same thing here
Me too  Please Help
Having the same problem

Same thing happened last year to me, I'll tell you what I did, maybe it will help yall.

You should wait a day or two before you redeem the card.
If at that point it goes through and says the card's code has already been redeemed, contact support and they'll work on getting that resolved for you.
Put in a ticket anyway.
how do you contact the support i went to the website and got lost. I'm new to the website.

DO NOT keep spamming it, this can cause your RP card to "Redeem" itself while not giving you the RP and can cause you to lose it, it's better to just wait.

This has already happened to me and I'm submitting a ticket for it now, but knowing how Riot support works I bet I'll never see the RP I bought and will just be emailed about how the store is experiencing issues right now.

I've responded to your support request, but also wanted to tap you on your shoulder here to let you know that things should be good now. Check your RP balance just to be sure!
If you have any other issues with this, just update your support request and I'll be there for you. :)


If anyone else encounters an error where your RP code redemption attempt comes back with a "code already redeemed" message, let us know here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
the same thing happened to me and this morning i tried again and it said the card had already been redeemed

Did some tinkering on your account, and your RP balance should be accurate now. :)

If anyone else has the "redeemed" issue, let us know via Riot Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Hi guys,

There's actually known issues with the stores as mentioned over at: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na

Coupled with the excessive traffic during this festive period and unfortunately it's gonna be a bit difficult to redeem. The only advice for now is to intermittently keep trying - it should eventually work, but just when the store is less busy/the transaction manages to get through. Sorry for the inconvenience :-(
i entered two of my 10$ rp cards in and it had an error i kept trying and now it says i already redeemed it but i dont have the rp for it please riot can i get this fixed?

Tried to redeem a 50 dollar pre-paid card and was told it was already redeemed. I tried again and was told I had "exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time." Thanks riot, I love it when I pay for a service and get nothing in return and am told I need to wait even longer. {{champion:24}}
I am really pissed anything i type it will say redeeming?{{champion:91}}
How long did it take to recieve help? I'm still waiting.
Yeah that happened and mine has replied the card has already been redeemed the next day when I tried it so I sent in a report and now waiting for it to be fixed.
Riot theflash i sent a ticket can you help me!

I got really pissed cause before christmas im suppose to have a fkin Dunkmaster by now.
Riot cmon!My Grandpa has to refund and buy anew damn card!{{champion:32}}
Same happening here .
rito pls help cant get past redeeming :((((((

Me too :(

Hopefully it gets fixed soon.
Same here, both my boys having this issue
i had waited so long for dragon fist lee to go on sale! now i cant purchase it. r u kidding. f word. pls fix it
Same thing happened to my $50 rp card.  Please rito do something!!!!!  {{item:3151}}
The same thing is happening to me!!1 :'(((( i have a 50 $ rp card thats not working, i says that the rp has allready been redeemed  roit plz help me :(
